Class JsonUtils

java.lang.Object
com.groq.api.utils.JsonUtils
public final class JsonUtils extends Object
Utility class for working with JSON in the Groq API.

  • Method Details

    • extractContentFromCompletion

      public static String extractContentFromCompletion(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode response)
      Extracts the content of text from a chat completion response.
      Parameters:
      response - The JSON response from the chat completion API.
      Returns:
      The extracted content as a string, or null if not found.

    • extractContentFromChunk

      public static String extractContentFromChunk(com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode chunk)
      Extracts the content of text from a streaming chunk.
      Parameters:
      chunk - The JSON chunk from a streaming response.
      Returns:
      The extracted content as a string, or null if not found.

    • createChatRequest

      public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode createChatRequest(String model, List<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> messages, float temperature)
      Creates a chat request with multiple messages.
      Parameters:
      model - The model to use for the request.
      messages - The list of messages as JsonNodes.
      temperature - The temperature parameter for generation.
      Returns:
      A JSON object representing the request.

    • createSimpleChatRequest

      public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode createSimpleChatRequest(String model, String userMessage, String systemMessage, float temperature)
      Creates a simple chat request with a single user message.
      Parameters:
      model - The model to use for the request.
      userMessage - The user's message.
      systemMessage - Optional system message.
      temperature - The temperature parameter for generation.
      Returns:
      A JSON object representing the request.

    • createVisionRequestWithUrl

      public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode createVisionRequestWithUrl(String imageUrl, String prompt, String model, Float temperature)
      Creates a vision request with an image URL.
      Parameters:
      imageUrl - The URL of the image to analyze.
      prompt - The text prompt for the model.
      model - The vision model to use.
      temperature - The temperature parameter for generation.
      Returns:
      A JSON object representing the request.

    • createVisionRequestWithBase64

      public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode createVisionRequestWithBase64(String base64Image, String prompt, String model, Float temperature)
      Creates a vision request with a base64-encoded image.
      Parameters:
      base64Image - The base64-encoded image data.
      prompt - The text prompt for the model.
      model - The vision model to use.
      temperature - The temperature parameter for generation.
      Returns:
      A JSON object representing the request.

    • createToolsRequest

      public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode createToolsRequest(String model, List<com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode> messages, List<Tool> tools, float temperature)
      Creates a request for using tools.
      Parameters:
      model - The model to use.
      messages - The conversation messages.
      tools - The list of tools to make available.
      temperature - The temperature parameter for generation.
      Returns:
      A JSON object representing the request.

    • createToolResponseMessage

      public static com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.JsonNode createToolResponseMessage(String toolCallId, String functionName, String functionResponse)
      Creates a message representing a tool's response.
      Parameters:
      toolCallId - The ID of the tool call.
      functionName - The name of the function that was called.
      functionResponse - The response from the function.
      Returns:
      A JSON object representing the tool's response message.
